input: I want to set up a direct debit mandate for the account with the ID TEST5678 using the following details: Debtor Party: Alice Johnson, Creditor Party: Internet Service Provider, Creditor Party ID: DE123456789012345, Debtor Bank Account: DE89370400440532013001, Signature Date: 2023-10-05, Signature City Name: Munich, Validity Period: 2024-10-05, Direct Debit Scheme Code: 1, Direct Debit Scheme Name: SEPA Core, Direct Debit Collection SEPA Sequence Type Code: RCUR, Direct Debit Collection SEPA Sequence Type Name: Recurring.
